Package order

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BranchMenuController
    This class is used to show menu of a supplier to the customer The controller loads dishes of the supplier from the DB Divides the dishes by type user can choose dish from menu, than select the dish details and add it to the cart when there are dishes in the cart user can view the cart and remove dishes or continue to checkout
    CartController
    This class is used to show our cart screen loads a list of all dishes in order user can remove items from cart
    CartItemController
    This class is used to show a single dish item in cart screen
    ChooseSupplierController
    This class is for showing available supplier for the user according to his home brnach user can choose in upper left screen a different branch to get the supplier from that branch
    DishController
    This class is for representing a dish in the branch menu controller each dish load its image and set label according to dish details
    GetDishesService
    This class is a Service Class used for loading all dishes images from their byte arrays uses for the progress indicator in BranchMenuController
    MyOrdersController
    This class is for showing all orders of the logged in customer divides the orders to 3 accordions
    OrderConfirmedController
    This class is for showing order confirmation screen showing order summary info
    OrderInformationController
    This class is used to order information inputs for the user if the selected order is for delivery screen will require extra delivery fields input for time and date for all order types
    OrderRecordController
    This class is for creating order titled pane details in MyOrdersController sets an approve button only for orders that been accepted by supplier and not been recieved by customer
    PaymentController
    This class is for selecting payment method user can choose between private payment - CC and business pay - only if he has approved business account when selecting shard delivery payment must be from business account when pay is from business account user need to input employer code
    PaymentStatusController
    This class showing user is payment to approve user can approve payment thru listener
    QRSimulationController
    This class is for showing a simulation for QR W4C code loads the customer w4c card from DB
    W4CLoginController
    This class is for login with W4C card user can input card number manually or getting the number from QR
